Key Match Events: The Blazers led by 22 points in the first half. However, the Pistons managed to come back and win the game 118-115.
Cade Cunningham had 32 points and nine assists, while Tim Hardaway Jr. added 26 points for Detroit.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was honoring Coach Chauncey Billups for his contributions to Detroit's 2004 championship and his induction into the Basketball Hall of Fame.
Others: The Pistons (18-18) have won seven of eight games, improving significantly from their 3-33 record a season ago.
